help-file.title: SHAPECHANGE SHAPE
help-file.content:
Syntax: To shapechange: shapechange <target> To return to normal: shapechange me
Druids use this innate ability to change their form. Through careful research, the Druid is capable of reforming its body into almost any animal.
To change into an animal, the druid finds a suitable animal, and while standing alongside it, types "shapechange animal" (replacing animal with the name of the animal.) While in this form, the druid will notice that it takes considerably longer to commune spells. As well, if the druid becomes engaged in battle while shape changed, they may revert into their original form.
Changing back: Type "shape me" to change back into your original form.
